price: 2. Ye nde akela liwa mpe bomoyi mpo ameka bino mpe atala nani kati na bino akosala malamu koleka. Mpe azali wa bokasi atonda bolimbisi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa al-mawta wal-ḥayata liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu ʿamalan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ghafūru
